thread.title: Scientist.com Adds Accomplished Pharma Executive Arne Brandon to Management Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Scientist.com Adds Accomplished Pharma Executive Arne Brandon to Management Team
text:
Fast-growing outsourcing marketplace adds Chief Commercial Officer to oversee international expansion
SAN DIEGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Scientist.com , the life science industry’s leading online marketplace for outsourced research, announced today the appointment of Arne Brandon to its senior leadership team. As the company’s chief commercial officer, Brandon will focus on growth of the platform within global pharma and biotech markets.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180207005057/en/
New CCO, Arne Brandon, brings experience and leadership to Scientist.com . (Graphic: Business Wire)
“We are delighted to have someone with Arne’s breadth of experience, superb execution abilities and strong industry connections join the Scientist.com management team,” said Kevin Lustig, PhD, Scientist.com’s CEO and Founder. “His technology background and business expertise will help us continue our rapid expansion into new research areas and geographic locations.”
Brandon brings over three decades of business development experience within the life sciences to Scientist.com . Before joining the company, he was Vice President of Global Strategic Partnerships at VWR International. Previously he held senior leadership positions at Thermo Fisher Scientific and Life Technologies. He is an industry thought leader who has consistently delivered exceptional growth and greater productivity.
“I am excited to join Scientist.com at this critical time in the company’s global expansion,” added Brandon. “By enabling all scientists to access the latest research tools and technologies in one easy-to-use convenient marketplace, Scientist.com is revolutionizing how drug discovery is done.”
About Scientist.com
Scientist.com is the world's leading marketplace for outsourced research. The marketplace simplifies the entire research sourcing process, saving time and money and providing access to the latest innovative tools and technologies while maintaining full compliance with an organization’s procurement policies. Scientist.com operates private enterprise marketplaces for most of the world’s major pharmaceutical companies, VWR and the US National Institutes of Health (NIH). Since its founding in 2007, Scientist.com has raised more than $33 million from Leerink Transformation Partners, 5AM Ventures, Heritage Provider Network, Bootstrap Ventures and Hollywood producer Jack Giarraputo among others.
